document.full_text: the french government is convening a meeting in june to agree on a plan to stem volatility in the price and supply of staple foods, a source of political unrest.
document.title: france marshals g-20 to combat rising food costs
lines_and_colors: the french government is convening a meeting in june to agree on a plan to stem volatility in the price and supply of staple foods, a source of political unrest.
